column4: Does anyone know how I can install moonlight in Google Chrome?  I downloaded the CRX file but it won't let me install it as it isn't from the Chrome store.
my only guess: try drag and dropping it in the extensions tab
I found that answer in a couple of places too, but it doesn't do anything at all.

I drag the file out of nautilus, hover over the extensions window and in some screenshots I saw it pop up a message saying to drag/drop there, but I don't get that no matter where I hover with the file.  And when I let go nothing happens.
